articles.author: Alison Durkee
articles.title: Trump Paid Lawyers More Than $5 Million Last Month—More Than The Cash He Has On Hand - Forbes
articles.description: Trump’s Save America PAC reported spending more money last month than it raised.
articles.content: Former President Donald Trump paid his attorneys more than $5 million in February through his Save America PAC, new filings showmore than all of his expenses combined the month beforeas the ex-presid… [+5410 chars]
